title: 1 High-Yield ETF I Recommend to Nearly All Retirees
full_text:
1 High-Yield ETF I Recommend to Nearly All Retirees. Retirees facing low bond yields have turned to high-dividend equity strategies, but not all approaches deliver the stability fixed-income investors need. The.... PeopleImages / Getty Images
  • SPYD offers a 4.7% yield from 80 equally weighted high-dividend S&P 500 stocks with a 0.07% expense ratio.
  • The funds quarterly dividends fluctuated … [+4856 chars]
